Our Consulting Process

Structured approach to deliver maximum value and actionable recommendations

Step 11-2 weeks
Discovery & Assessment
Current state analysis and gap identification
  • Stakeholder interviews
  • Document review
  • Infrastructure assessment
  • Compliance gap analysis
Step 22-3 weeks
Strategy Development
Security strategy and roadmap creation
  • Risk prioritization
  • Control framework selection
  • Budget planning
  • Timeline development
Step 32-4 weeks
Solution Design
Detailed security architecture and implementation planning
  • Technical specifications
  • Vendor evaluations
  • Integration planning
  • Testing strategies
Step 4Ongoing
Implementation Support
Guidance during deployment and configuration
  • Project management
  • Technical oversight
  • Training delivery
  • Progress monitoring

Risk Assessment Framework

Comprehensive risk evaluation using industry-standard methodologies

Risk Identification
  • Asset inventory and classification
  • Threat landscape analysis
  • Vulnerability assessment
  • Impact analysis
Risk Analysis
  • Likelihood assessment
  • Business impact evaluation
  • Risk scoring and prioritization
  • Mitigation strategy development
